channel.title: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?" - Frusation.

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded:
And I'm Chuunin, I'm gonna train at this level until I become really really good at bingoing >_<

That's a bad idea. Sp Jonin and Jonin get range bonuses, and in a protracted bingo battle you'll need them.

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded:
It has always been a rare missionâ€¦
It's easier to just bingo people until you get The Trade, then take Hyuk and Right on missions to get pages. You roll your attack before your enemy hits back, so even if you take more damage, you still have one extra round to kill them. Just pick targets from small non-NRF villages, because they have low HP.

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded: I found lots of Notes from the prize wheel ive got 3 currently but I hardly ever go bingoing. (Also my first real post here haha)

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded: first are you using general or genjutsu mission? it is from what I've heard genernal only. From my experience EDUT will do plenty you dont need the others

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded: I'm sure I found it while spamming gen missions but alright. And I'm Chuunin, I'm gonna train at this level until I become really really good at bingoing >_<

item.title: Re: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded:
I'm pretty sure it's been a rare mission for a while now.

For season 1, getting note pages is kind of difficult. In season 2, it's easier since you can cheat the prize wheel, and you're more likely to do things like make the Trade, get the Note or get the Tote.

I would suggest getting a Risky Badge from the arena, however. Having one, and a party like Ro-Sham-Bo Redux helps a ton for bingo'ing with Risky Badge.

item.title: Note Pages? Absurd to obtain with bloodline?
item.content:encoded: Bingoing someone is so stupid that even if I get higher rolls in a stat the my foe I lose MORE hp then he does even if we started out equal HP. So I decided to hunt for note pages. FOR FIVE DAYS. and guess what? I only ever got the mission ONCE out of all the C-Rank gen missions ONLY ONCE did I ever get it. and even then no note page when I succeeded. Is there anyway to make this easier. I plan to use the Spot and Red Rover team and the Urine tech when I get it next time but how do I make it frequent? Seriously did they remove it and made it a rare mission?
